LanguageData.Kurin_Gun_Flamethrower.label: 魅狐火焰喷射器
LanguageData.Kurin_Gun_Flamethrower.description: [FXF-A1] - [火柴]\n\n〜“火柴”是魅狐们的一种先进而残忍的火焰喷射器。让火焰净化一切！
LanguageData.Kurin_Gun_Flamethrower.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.Kurin_Gun_Flamethrower.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Kurin_Bullet_Flamethrower.label: 喷射火焰
